changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `hts`.`sequencingbarcode` (`groupkey`, `idx`, `sequence`, `defunct`) select 'NS3', idx, sequence, defunct from `hts`.`sequencingbarcode` where groupkey = 'NS2';

changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
changeSet.comment: Modify 240 and 245 Sequencing barcodes for NS3
